attributes.action: introduce legislation to prohibit the use of electricity to illuminate decorations at any religious holidays, such as Christmas, nor seaside decorations, like those at Blackpool.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Christmas decorations have ALREADY reared their head in my home town.  The use of electricity and the increase in carbon footprint for mere decorative purposes is immoral in this day and age of threat to the planet and needs to be stopped, completely.
